site_name: VETERINARY HEALTH SOURCE L L C

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
- The facility is using a variety of documents to perform semiannual facility inspections and program review, but there is a
lack of clarity as to when the meetings actually took place and who was present. It is also unclear if the existing
paperwork covers all required areas such as protocol reviews, public complaints, and any minority opinions among the
IACUC. The facility must review the animal use program and inspect all animal facilities at least once every six months.
The facility must prepare reports of its evaluations, reviewed and signed by a majority of the IACUC, and including any
minority views. The reports must contain a description of the nature and extent of the research facility's adherence to
these requirements.
Correct from this date (11 August 2025) forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
- The facility is using a variety of documents to perform semiannual facility inspections and program review, but there is a 
lack of clarity as to when the meetings actually took place and who was present. It is also unclear if the existing 
paperwork covers all required areas such as protocol reviews, public complaints, and any minority opinions among the 
IACUC. The facility must review the animal use program and inspect all animal facilities at least once every six months. 
The facility must prepare reports of its evaluations, reviewed and signed by a majority of the IACUC, and including any 
minority views. The reports must contain a description of the nature and extent of the research facility's adherence to 
these requirements. 
Correct from this date (11 August 2025) forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
 n
